name: mialovebot
description: A Twitter bot team trying to remind elected officials who they work for.

scripts.start: npm run frontail && npm run start:bot && pm2 logs
scripts.dockerreup: npm run dockerdown && npm run dockerup
scripts.dockerdown: docker stop mialovebot-alpha && docker rm mialovebot-alpha
scripts.dockerup: npm run dockerbuild && npm run dockerrun

author: Jeremy Voros
